rev.desc.rev.desc: Enhancement added to build.schedule panel allowing for the title of the alert schedule record to include "Unsuspend record" instead of "Alert record" when the schedule record is a result of suspend/unsuspend processing. Additional parameter added to the parameter panel allows for the contents of the problem record to be passed in.
Added the word "Category" to the activity field of the schedule record of the alert.

descript.descript: Enhancement added to build.schedule panel allowing for the title of the alert schedule record to include "Unsuspend record" instead of "Alert record" when the schedule record is a result of suspend/unsuspend processing. Additional parameter added to the parameter panel allows for the contents of the problem record to be passed in.
Added the word "Category" to the activity field of the schedule record of the alert.
